resources.string: Conclusions\n \t\t\t\tThe study was performed according to the study protocol.\n \t\t\t\tThe test product is bioequivalent to the reference product in terms of rate and extent of absorption.
Therapeutic equivalence can be assured when the product is both pharmaceutically equivalent/alternative and bioequivalent
US Food and Drug Administration - Center on Drug Research Evaluation and Research
Bioequivalent to the innovator brand\nApproved as THERAPEUTICAL EQUIVALENT to innovator brand by the US-Food Drug Administration\nECONOMICAL Atorvastatin brand
Glicla - Natrapharm\n30mg modified release Tablet\nAnti-Diabetic Agent
